$BCH and $ADA have been in sideways ranges for the longest duration of all the Majors. In comparison:  $BCH 118 Days $ADA 90 Days $LTC 88 Days $EOS 60 Days $TRX broke it's range after 58 Days $XRP broke it's range after 38 Days  https://t.co/C8PosHdIHZ

#Staking on #Cardano #Shelley test-net with real $ADA reward begins after the second snapshot that comes after 2 weeks after the first snapshot.   So probably in November!  Only the second snapshot brings your ADA to test-net.  #blockchain #crypto  https://t.co/2IyGPmxrQf

Participation in the #Cardano Shelley test-net requires $ADA and SEED manipulation.   Always ensure that you have a SEED of wallet where you have ADA and SEED of wallet to which you want to send ADA.  Never reveal SEED or send ADA to anybody within the test-net.   #blockchain  https://t.co/u78pXPoN3w
